PropertyList.text:
Parking : 700 RPM. adjust altimeter. align gyro with magnetic compass. Taxi : low pitch. turn with throttle on 1 outboard engine. Takeoff : flaps 1/3, 2400 RPM. lift off between 80 kt (full) and 60 kt (empty load). nose goes down (bow inside water). Climb : retract flaps before 105 kt. heading hold and pitch hold are engaged separately. 37.5 inhg, 2300 RPM. 150 kt (full), 160 kt (empty). Cruise : economic : 102 kt at 9000 ft (full), 117 kt at 13400 ft (empty load). max : 160 kt. Navigation : align gyro with magnetic compass. listen in four course radio range of destination. Descent : idle, max pitch. increase mixture with decreasing altitude. Approach : flaps 1/3 below 105 kt. Landing : align at 1500 ft, flaps 2/3 below 105 kt. at 1000 ft, full flaps below 90 kt. touch down behind the step, between 60 (empty load) and 75 kt (full). nose goes up (skipping or stern inside water). Stop : 700 RPM, shutdown 2 or 4 engines.
________________________Limitations________________________ max glide or dive : 185 kt Vmax at 6200 ft : 175 kt Vcruise at 11000 ft : 160 kt flaps extended (40° or less) : 105 kt flaps extended (more than 40°) : 91 kt Vstall : 61 kt
take-off (2 minutes) : 43.5 inhg 2400 rpm maximum at sea level : 37.5 inhg 2300 rpm maximum at 6200 ft : 35.8 inhg 2300 rpm
ceiling : 19600 ft cruise : 13400 ft runway : less than 6000 ft for takeoff
max take-off : 84000 lb max landing : 80000 lb
